name: pibble-focus-pet
description: Chrome extension + web app: Virtual Pet Study Helper using client-side AI (Prompt, Summarizer, Proofreader placeholders). Vite + React + TypeScript.

scripts.build: npm run build:bg && npm run build:assistant && npm run build:overlay
scripts.build:dist: vite build && mkdir -p dist/content dist/injected dist/assets dist/icons && esbuild src/background.ts --bundle --format=iife --target=chrome114 --outfile=dist/background.js && esbuild src/content/contentScript.ts --bundle --format=iife --target=chrome114 --outfile=dist/content/assistant.js && esbuild src/content/petOverlay.ts --bundle --format=iife --target=chrome114 --outfile=dist/content/petOverlay.js && cp public/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp -R public/assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -R public/icons/* dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp public/injected/pageBridge.js dist/injected/pageBridge.js
